scripts.prepare-avalanche: cp templates/subgraph.avalanche.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-fantom: cp templates/subgraph.fantom.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-gnosis: cp templates/subgraph.gnosis.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-polygon: cp templates/subgraph.polygon.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy-avalanche: npm run clean && npm run prepare-avalanche &&  graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/curve-gauges-avalanche
scripts.deploy-fantom: npm run clean && npm run prepare-fantom &&  graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/curve-gauges-fantom
scripts.deploy-gnosis: npm run clean && npm run prepare-gnosis &&  graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/curve-gauges-gnosis
scripts.deploy-polygon: npm run clean && npm run prepare-polygon &&  graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/curve-gauges-polygon
